name: The Scuffed Series 15 - Bloodlust of a Gladiator
name_original: The Scuffed Series 15 - Bloodlust of a Gladiator
description:
5/5 - Considered releasing it on Steam

Fight for your live in a never ending onslaught of gladiators. The crowd demands blood and you came to answer their call.

You are equipped with up to five spears that you can carry on your back and in your hands. Fight against other gladiators in increasingly difficult rounds by throwing your spears. When you run out of spears, collect them from the environment and charge into battle again.

You can toggle fullscreen with Alt + Enter and resize the window with Alt + Arrow up and Alt + Arrow Down

If you want to find out what The Scuffed Series is all about, check out the website (link in infos down below)
